content: for seaming slipper ribbing section and back of slipper for ws row *k1 tbl k8 p1 k7 p1 k8 wyif slip cuffed version tack folded over cuff to garter section last st p-wise of slipper weave in ends attach pompom make a rs row k1 tbl k to last st wyif slip last st p- second slipper wise repeat from * for 14 ridges or 4 inches end with a ws row large men s slipper instructions rs row * p1 k1 to end of row several people have wanted to make a larger size ws row k1 p1 to end of row * parkspin slipper so here are the numbers hope this repeat between * * 4 more times 10 row in helps total or 2 inches cast on 35 sts 43 for a cuffed slipper toe decreases ws row *k1tbl k10 14 p1 k11 p1 k10 14 rib 7 k2tog k1 ssk rib 3 k2tog k1 ssk rib 7 wyif slip last stitch purl-wise 23 sts rs row k1tbl k to last st wyif slip last st finishing cut yarn leaving a 16 inch tail draw purlwise* repeat between * * for approximately through sts on needle slip off pull up tight fasten 6 inches if working a fold over cuff cast off 4 sts sew top of slipper ribbing section and back of at beginning of final two row end with a wrong slipper weave in ends attach pompom make a side row second slipper ribbed toe rs row *p1 k1 across row women s medium slipper instructions ws row k1 p1 across row repeat these two fold over cuff option in parentheses row from * for 3 5 to 4 inches or desired length cast on 29 37 sts with doubled yarn hint decrease toe leave extra for seaming row 1 rib 9 ssk k1 k2tog rib 7 ssk k1 k2tog ws row *k1 tbl k8 12 p1 k9 p1 k8 12 rib 9 31 sts wyif slip last st p-wise row 2 rib 9 p3 rib 7 p3 rib 9 rs row k1 tbl k to last st wyif slip last st p- row 3 rib 8 ssk k1 k2tog rib 5 ssk k1 k2tog wise repeat from * for 17 ridges for a fold rib 8 27 sts over cuff cast off 4 sts at beginning of next 2 row 4 rib 8 p3 rib 5 p3 rib 8 row or for 18 ridges or 5 inches for no row 5 rib 7 ssk k1 k2tog rib 3 ssk k1 k2tog cuff end with a ws row rib 7 23 sts rs row * p1 k1 to end of row finish as for women s medium slipper ws row k1 p1 to end of row * a bit of local history monarch knitting ltd was a 4-storey repeat between * * 5 more times 12 row in spinning and knitting mill which operated in st thomas total or 3 inches ontario from 1908 until
